Strings.Text: It's a jeep for transporting \nmaterials. Looks like it has been {pause}{clear}untouched for years.{pause}
The rubbish is blocking the \ntunnel path. There seems to be {pause}{clear}moss of some sort on pieces of \nconcrete.{pause}

A section of a fence is missing 
due to the giant dinosaur {pause}{clear}passing through this area. 
Vegetation of vigorous growth {pause}{clear}characteristic has already filled 
the area.{pause}

A section of a fence is missing 
due to the giant dinosaur {pause}{clear}passing through this area. 
Vegetation of vigorous growth {pause}{clear}characteristic has already filled 
the area.{pause}
